1.Cons: the people, the management, the low pay

2.Pros: I got a lot of hours

4.Pros: It was fast paced time went by really fast. Met new people, got to put a smile on many young peoples faces. :)
4.Cons: Not their fault but some of the customers where jerks. Cat calls, threatening to call the police, asked one of my female co workers "so what are you going to do with all those ones". The store was really greasy but that's hard to avoid. Some managers where jerks some where amazing, there where so many you never really knew how your day was going to go.

5.Pros: Big company, learn alot, experience will be usefull with other food chains
5.Cons: fast pace is not for everyone

6.Pros: good environment good people easy work
6.Cons: Drama avoid getting involved with drama, some people are lazy and dont want to do anything leaving you to do everything

7.Cons: Smell like fish filet at the end of the ay

8.Summary: "Stressful Job. They overwork you for what you're getting paid."
8.Cons: Not worth it for the money you're making.
